item.title: How to Setup Jenkins X on Oracle Container Engine
item.description: Abstract This setup guide will help to setup jenkins-x on an OKE cluster. Prereqs Install the OCI CLI Configure the oci profile config file Install kubectl install jenkins-x Step 1 deploy vcn and resources in OCI use the network module for a template of how to configure 2 load balancer subnets and 3 public worker subnet with appropriate security list docs on how to configure your vcn for OKE Step 2 Deploy new cluster in OCI Create a new oke cluster with jenkins x installed the regional container engine for kubernetes rest endpoint to find the ocid of the vcn, compartment, load balancer and worker subnets refer to the oci console jx create cluster oke \ --name="c2-jx-cluster" \ --docker-registry="iad.
